headline: A Look at Fiserv’s (FI) Valuation Following Investor Lawsuits and Recent Slowdown in Clover Growth
summary: The latest development surrounding Fiserv (FI) has certainly given investors pause. Multiple class action lawsuits were filed, alleging that Fiserv masked a slowdown in new merchant business by forcing migrations from its Payeezy platform to Clover, its cloud-based payment product. Claims suggest that this maneuver temporarily boosted the company’s revenue growth, while core challenges, including merchants leaving for competitors, were not fully disclosed. Now, with these legal actions...
